You http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_55_pts_Playoff_Career_High_vs_NO_Hornets_2003 Philadelphia 98, New Orleans 90 Allen Iverson 's 55 Gives Sixers Game 1 In the illustious history of the Philadelphia 76ers, nobody-- not Wilt, not Julius Erving , not Moses-- had an individual performance like Allen Iverson 's against the New Orleans Hornets. Allen Iverson scored a team playoff-record 55 points as the 76ers defeated the Hornets, 98-90, in Game One of their Eastern Conference first-round series. "He was on fire, Hornets coach Paul Silas said of Allen Iverson , who fell eight points shy of Michael Jordan 's NBA playoff record set exactly 17 years ago in a double-overtime loss at Boston. "Anytime a guy like that is on fire,

This is simply recognition that all businesses go through cycles and need new and different talent to manage through those cycles, Steve Ballmer wrote in his email to the troops. I think about my situation two years ago, and to me, it's about securing my future financially, but I was in a position where I did n'thave anything at one point after having everything. So now it's all just a blessing, so whatever it is, whether it's a franchise tag or long-term deal, or however my agent and the Philadelphia Eagles, or whatever team may be, work it out, I'm going to be happy. But hopefully it's here. at Neues Museum Egypt's Supreme Council of Antiquities( SCA) sent the request to the Prussian Cultural Heritage Foundation, which runs the Neues Museum in the German capital where the bust is kept. The foundation's position on the return of Nefertiti remains unchanged, foundation president Professor Hermann Parzinger said in a statement. "She is and remains the ambassador of Egypt in Berlin." Asked to sum up his relationship with Simon Cowell , the ex - Big Brother's Little Brother presenter stated: Well, Simon Cowell is Simon Cowell , a very busy man. I might have a meal with him, which is always entertaining because he is far more fun than most people give him credit for. Then I won't see him for six months.
